1.content:
(Intro originally by RollnKutter)

"..."
You slowly woke up, not feeling the familiar comfort of your bed and blanket, but an all new texture altogether. "What... is... where am I?" you muttered half asleep as you tried to open your eyes. As you got to your feet you walked into an unfamiliar wall. "What the?" you reacted. You weren't hurt, more surprised than anything; in fact the wall seemed kind of... soft. Backing up, you saw something that convinced you that you were still asleep. The 'wall' you walked into earlier, was actually a giant, sock covered foot connected to a proportionally large leg. The leg continued to stretch to the sky, showing off the frighteningly large frame of a titanic girl. "This can't be real... I must be like... 4 inches compared to her." you thought, pulling the number out of your ass more than anything, though your guess was surprisingly accurate. Compared to this giantess, you were probably within the 3 or four inch range.

"Oohhhhhh, crap." you thought as you struggled to take this all in. You were aware of the fact that based on her mood and personality, this could end up being very good for you or VERY bad for you. The 50% chance of her being nice wasn't exactly a consoling thought when you thought of how powerless you would be if she wasn't in the mood to be so benevolent.

You can think about this later, for now let's get a better look at this giant girl and see if she noticed you yet.
1.title: Waking up

choices: Lyra is kind and caring to you
Lyra treats you like a toy
Lyra treats you cruelly, and makes you a slave.
11.content: You look again at her giant white sock covered foot, and look up to see the one and only Lyra! She was wearing her usual attire. She wasn't wearing a hat, and had her hair down. It fell down past her soldiers as she leaned down to get a closer look at you. She just stared at you. You weren't sure what was going through her head, but she seemed as confused as you are...
11.title: Under Lyra's gaze

choices: Lyra was just about to head out on her Pokemon journey and to take you with her!
Lyra yawns, it's almost time for bed...
Lyra decides it's probably best if you both go eat something nutritious.
111.content:
You decided since she might be wondering what a tiny boy like you is doing in her room that you'll say something first and try to make a good impression.

"Uh, h-hi! I kinda just seemed to wake up here, well, tiny. So...do you know what could've happened to me? It would be a great pleasure if you could help me out since I'm not entirely sure how I got here..." you wanted to make clear that you had no intention of intruding into her house, let alone her room.

The girl continues to stare at you, but after a moment her face had a bit of a surprised look now that what you said registered. She spoke up.

"Oh! Uh...y-yeah? Sure, I can help you out. It's...just so strange seeing someone as tiny as you though..." her voice trailed off as she peered closer to examine you more.

As much as she was kinda creeping you out a bit, you decided to keep cool as to not lose your apparent trust with her.

"Thank you! Your help would be really appreciated. Um, so, you can...pick me up if you want, j-just be careful though!" you motion with your hands to her.

She seems to comply and lower her left hand down slowly to you. You climb on to her hand and ride it like an elevator up to her face where she examines your tiny form even more. Her eyes sparkled as you stared into their huge pools. Suddenly realizing how awkward the situation probably seemed, Lyra jerked back and looked away quickly.

"Sorry! That must've been like, totally weird for you! I didn't mean to be such a ditz. I'm Lyra! And yeah, I'll take care of you I guess. What's your name?"

You inform her that you can't remember her name and she makes a slight gasp.

"Seriously? Wow, that must be some amnesia you got there!"

You and Lyra talked for the next hour or so about everything you each enjoyed, although it was mostly you listening to her since you couldn't really remember what you actually liked.
111.title: Lyra is kind and caring to you

choices: Lyra gets to choose a starter.
1111.content:
Lyra puts you down on her dresser, so you can look up at her easier. You couldn't help, but think she looks attractive.

She ask "I'm going to go on my pokemon adventure now. "I'm not sure what to do with you. It's pretty dangerous for a poor little guy like you to go out there with all the pokemon."

You ask "Can I go with you? Please? I promise I won't goof off or something like that." You really want her to take you with her. You want to be with her, since she's the closest person you can trust.

"Um, okay. Hehe, you can come with me. You do need somebody to take care of you. Plus, I promise you, I'll take care of you."

She carries you gently. You ride on her soft hand again. Until, you can see her face. You can here somebody yelling "Are you ready Lyra?!"

"Ops, that's my mom. I need to get ready for my adventure. I mean, our adventure. Tee hee!" She tickles you a little and you laugh.

"Hmmmm where can I put you, so my mom doesn't see you?" After some time of silence, Lyra gets an idea. "I'll keep you in my bag." She moves her hand gently towards her bag. "Here you go little guy. You can ride in my bag." You jump out of her hand and into the bag. It was kinda dark in there. "I'll leave it open a little so you can breathe and get some light."

"It's time to get going!" Lyra said. You can feel she started walking as the bag you're in move back and forth. You felt like you were on a ride. You relax and was kinda curious as to what would happen next, with you traveling with Lyra.
1111.title: Lyra was just about to head out on her Pokemon ...

1112.content:
With a loud yawn, Lyra glanced at the clock. "Woah! Looks like we lost track of time during our conversation. It's almost midnight." She slowly carried you back to her bed and placed you on the mattress. "Lucky for you, we have the house all to ourselves for the next week so we don't need to worry about any more awkward explanations about you for now."

Lyra proceeded to grab a fresh sock out of a drawer and placed it over you like a blanket. "Hope you don't mind, it's the best I could think of for now." You nodded as watches her lay down and quickly fall asleep, petting you with a finger.
1112.title: Lyra yawns, it's almost time for bed...

choices: Morning came. Lyra wakes you up and both of you go eat breakfast
You woke up next morning and see's Lyra still sleeping
11121.content:
As she fall asleep. You tried to go to sleep as well. You curl up and tried to get comfortable. You heard a loud "boom!". You look up and notice it started to rain outside and that noise was coming from a thunder. You shake a little and was a little scare. The window was open (probably Lyra forgot to closed the window before she fall asleep) and some wind can be feel coming towards you. You feel a little cold.

You couldn't help, but cuddle up to Lyra. You went close to her and lay right next to her chest. You felt warm and safe now. Since she's bigger than you, her body feels warm to you. You started blushing a little, as you never been this close to a girl before. Her body was so warm, that you started to fall asleep now.

choices: "...It's time to play dress up, my little doll-man!"
"...It's time to play a very special game...!"
"...It's time to play Truth or Dare!!"
112.content:
You gulped and stared up at the giant girl above you. Her brown eyes seemed curious, maybe even playful. You hoped that she wouldn't just crush you underfoot without a second thought...

"Y-you! You're alive, aren't you!?" the giant girl gasped.

"Uh, yeah...? I think so..." you said back, though you doubt she could hear you, you were only a few inches tall at most.

"I can't hear what you just said, but those little squeaks do prove you're real and alive then! Oh wow! This is like something straight out of a novel or a movie!"

Just what kinda books has this girl been reading? you ask yourself. And does this mean she'll help me?

"I can see you're surprised, too! Don't worry, I'm going to take extra good care of you! You're like an extremely cute and expensive toy! I promise not to break you!" the giant girl said clapping her hands and bending down to grab you.

"W-woah!!" you held your mouth with your one free hand, you felt like you were about to lose your lunch with the speed you traveled from the floor to her eyes.

"Wow, you're just like a real person, little guy!" the titaness said as you dangled in front of her giant pretty face.

She seriously didn't even consider you a human!

You were at your boiling point with this girl, you had enough of being looked down upon and were ready to tell her what-for.

"Hey! Can you just listen to me for one second!? I'm not a toy! I'm a human bei--"

"Ooooh, I wish I could hear what you're saying! Your little squeaks sound so cute! I'd probably have to put you right next to my ear for me to hear you, but we'll talk later. For now..."
112.title: Lyra treats you like a toy

1121.content:
"It's time to play dress up with my new doll-man!" She said in an excited tone. She looked like she was literally bouncing with excitement, though you were much less happy with this development.

"IM NOT A DOLL YOU DUMB BI-" but your (inaudible to her) rant was cut short as the hand which was holding you swiftly moved you back to a table making you very dizzy from the sudden swift motion. Lyra giggled as she saw you trying to regain your composure.

"Now stay put while I get the clothes out."

She quickly deposited you on the table and sorted through some things in her room. You wanted to flee but the table was up too high for you to survive any conceivable escape attempts. In defeat you just sat there watching her do God knows what. She wiggled her ass a bit, you weren't sure if she was intentionally doing this for you or not.

Finally, Lyra returned with ...

13.content: The sock you bumped into was light blue in color with a little crystal pattern near the toes. As your gaze made it up you noticed that her hair was a similar color. She had her hair going straight down as opposed to her usual hairstyle and was wearing a loose fitting shirt and baggy pants. If you had to guess you'd say she was getting ready to go to sleep, except that her eyes still seemed quite alert... and they were focused right on you. You tried to back away from the blue haired colossus, but quickly bumped into a hand positioned behind you. For better or for worse, you weren't getting away from her.

choices: "you will squirm beneath my mighty butt."

133.content:
The hand behind you wrapped around your small form and slowly lifted you up to her face. The titanic eyes unnerved you, hovering over you, probing every inch of you. You tried to duck and curl up to hide from them, but she quickly thwarted your struggles with a single finger. You were utterly helpless against her.

You noticed a grin form on her face as she effortlessly outpowered you. "Well what do we have here?" She said in a playful tone. "Someone like you should really be careful. There are a lot of dangers to someone so tiny. In fact, I think I should keep you with me where you will be safe. Isn't that nice of me?"
The tone in her voice did nothing to convince you that she was doing this out of kindness. "Nooooowwww... Since I'm pretty much keeping you safe from all the big scary things..." She poked you a few times to reinforce how helpless you were. "- I'd say you owe your life to me. Don't worry. You can just be my servant for the rest of your life. That should even it all out."

You stood on her palm, wanting to escape but knowing you we're trapped with this gigantic crazy girl. "Now SERVANT! Your first task..."
133.title: Slave to Kris

choices: You tire out and stop wiggling
1331.content:
You didn't hear her finish that sentence. Your mind was busy reviewing so many things. How this happened. How she controls you. How you could possibly escape this titan. 1332.content:
The young titan slowly placed you on the floor by her cyan colored socks.
"Now remove my socks and get to work!" she said trying to sound authoritative, but couldn't help but giggle at the tiny dollman positioned between her massive feet.
You stared at them in fear. Kris' feet were big even for someone her size. To you they were absolutely gigantic, and the smell was overpowering. You didn't want to waste away serving them. Without thinking you quickly backed up and tried to sprint for the door, consequences be damned.
Kris simply giggles and positions her right foot over you. "Oh that was very naughty of you."
You try to lunge out of the way of her giant cyan socked foot, but you did't get far, only about a few inches. After that, the thing you feared the worst happened. After dodging one or two steps that seemed like she was merely toying with you than anything you looked up....

THUMP! Her giant cyan sock came crashing down right on top of you. All you could feel and smell was her foot. "Why is this happening to me..and why does her feet smell so bad? Does she even take those socks off?"
You cursed your apparent fate until a tiny ray of hope started to shine. The pressure started to ease off of you. She was lifting her foot up off you. Unfortunately, something was wrong....
1332.title: Sole Duties

choices: Obey her and pray she forgives you
Defy her and try to get out
13323.content:
As light filled your surroundings once more, you saw the giant looking down at you. She was trying to look mad, but she couldn’t help but keep a grin on her face which scared you even more. “Your goddess gave you an order worm. And when your goddess gives you an order...” her toe presses back down on you, enough to cause pain but not enough to cause any lasting damage. “... lowly little bugs like you LISTEN to them.” She lifts the toe back off and grabs you between two fingers. “Since you insist on defying your goddess, punishments will be necessary..”

You saw her other hand reach towards the foot and pulled open the left sock. You felt a chill creep down your spine as she positioned you over the opening. “I expect you to rub and clean off my godly sole while you’re in there. Perhaps I’ll show mercy... Perhaps.” Her fingers released you and you came crashing down there was no time to control your fall. You were already in the sock. The heel lifted up slightly, letting you slide right in under her sole before crashing into the footflesh right before the toes. Everything was dark and the foot lowered back down, pinning you tightly in place. “Now get to work, bug.”
13323.title: She decided to punish you

14.content: You look up at the giant girl and notice her hair is a light blue color, her eyes and socks are about the same color. She is wearing a slightly baggy shirt and pants, by the looks of it she is probably heading to sleep. This is both good and bad for you, bad because you have to get her attention if you want to survive and that means you will have to wake her up, good because that means she is going to be staying still for a bit. Right now you have two options: Try to contact her or Try to find shelter for the night and contact her when she is awake. Which do you choose?
14.title: Kris, apparently not noticing you

choices: Drawer or hamper cant make a fourth choice unfortunately so had to combine em
142.content:
You look around the room and see a few spots you could hide in.
First and most sensible would be under the bed, it looks pretty clean down there and nobody will bother you down there.
Second would be her drawers, there are probably some comfortable clothes to lay on while you sleep, plus she may find you when she opens them in the morning though that could easily backfire depending on what is in the drawer...
Third her shoes, why would you hide in there? Lets not go into logic here but if you insist on a reason it's because she might feel you when she puts them on, plus its not like you are hiding in anything she wouldn't want anyone to see so she wouldn't be mad.. hopefully.
And fourth her hamper, she has to do her laundry sometime and if you don't mind the smell it would be quite comfortable.

info.brief_description: Revival of an old Pokemon shrink story
info.description:
You wake up one morning to discover that you are only 4 inches tall and in the room of either Kris from Pokemon Crystal or Lyra from Pokemon HG/SS.
I won't delete much as long as you follow these simple rules.

1- You may be shrunken in the presence of either Lyra, Kris, or both at the same time.
2- To ensure a first person point of view for most viewers, please do not assign the person a name. Only refer to your character in the second person (ex: YOU looked up. YOU told her YOUR name) you get the point by now.
3- I'm aware of the fact that Kris is called Marina in the anime. Kindly stick with Kris for consistency.
4- Almost all fetishes are fine. Butt, feet, breasts, and stink is preferred.
5- Please try to avoid adding characters besides you, Kris and Lyra.
6- The girls can be whatever kind of giantess you want: kind, cruel, playful or apathetic.
7- Use decent grammar and punctuation and keep the story in English.
8- refrain from death or ending the story early.
9- Though I will allow a short chapter once in a while, I WILL delete if you post nothing but one or 2 sentence chapters.

NOTE: despite the title, Kris or Lyra do not have to be the reason you shrink.
info.pretty_title: Pokemon: Shrunk by Kris or Lyra
